Introduction.content:
Ali was a poor fisherman. One day he pulled up an old lamp from the sea.

He rubbed it. POOF! A big smoke and a genie appeared.

The genie wore sunglasses and a smart shirt.

He said, “Thank you for freeing me! I will give you three wishes!”

Ali thought for two seconds and answered…

Chapter 1.chapter_title: No Money, No Cars – I Want a Job!
Chapter 1.content:
Ali said, “I don’t want gold or a big house.

I want a permanent government job with salary, medical cover, and pension!”

![Genie looking confused](https://picsum.photos/seed/genie-confused-job/800/600)

The genie scratched his head.

“Brother, I have been in that lamp for 2,000 years. Government forms are harder than magic!”

Chapter 2.chapter_title: Filling Forms for 24 Hours a Day
Chapter 2.content:
The genie worked day and night.

He printed Form Four results, birth certificate, NIDA number, and even a letter from the street chairman.

He stood in queue from 4 AM.

At the office window the clerk said, “Come back tomorrow.

![Genie in long government queue](https://picsum.photos/seed/genie-queue-office/800/600)

The genie cried real tears.

Chapter 3.content:
Finally the interview day came.

The panel asked Ali, “Why do you want this job?”

Before Ali could speak, the genie became angry and shouted,

“Because I can make all of you disappear with one clap!”

![Genie angry at interview panel](https://picsum.photos/seed/genie-angry-interview/800/600)

POOF! The three interviewers turned into green frogs.

They jumped out the window. Ribbit! Ribbit!

Chapter 4.content:
Police came to arrest the genie for turning officers into frogs.

Genie said, “They asked for tea money first! I only granted their wish!”

![Police arresting surprised genie](https://picsum.photos/seed/police-arrest-genie/800/600)

The case went to court. The judge also asked for a small gift.

POOF! The judge became a goat.

Chapter 5.content:
The president saw everything on TV.

He called the genie to the State House and said,

“We need someone like you! Be my Minister of Magic!”

The genie got a big office, driver, and free fuel.

![Genie happy in big office with flag](https://picsum.photos/seed/genie-minister-office/800/600)

His first law: Every Friday is Wish Day for good children.

Conclusion.content:
Ali got his government job (driver for the new minister).

The frogs and goat became human again after saying sorry.

The genie now wears suit and tie every day.

![Genie waving from government car](https://picsum.photos/seed/genie-government-car/800/600)

Moral of the story:
Even magic cannot beat government forms… but it can make you a minister!

The end.
